item.title: French touch dreamin 2022
item.description: French Touch Dreamin 2022 I was super glad to be Speaker for the first time at the French Touch dremin 2022. You can check my presentation at https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1yqZlCjhDxv6hEJJjoesuwR6RVJ8Xh-k2EA5FPc0vsns/edit?usp=share_link Source code at: https://github.com/jeremyvial/NAD_Grafana

item.title: First article on Medium
item.description: TexeiAdventCalendar participation Happy to release my 2 first article this month on Medium talking about Lightning Web Component security. Take me some time to create a little CTF challenge but it was fun to do ðŸ˜„ Article 1 - Challenge Article 2 - Answer and Review
